description: The major goals of the CRIS at the University of Münster are the University-wide harmonization and consolidation of the decentralized pools of research information, establishment of a central instrument for a consistent and continuous communication, documentation and reporting of the research activities and results as well as the strengthening of the perception and visibility of the university-wide research profile. To this end, the CRIS covers information about the researchers (CV), their affiliations to organizations of the University, their publications, projects, awards, supervised PhD-thesis and habilitation as well as patents. To get information about the context, in which research results are obtained, all this entities are related to each other
name: Converis WWU Münster
